model_name: Name of the model. TYPE: string. DEFAULT: 'default'.
model_version: Current version of the model. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: 1.0.1.

model_id: Unique id of the model. Replaces [key] with the key as a string. Replaces * with a unique identifer. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: '[model_name]_*'.
save_path: Path to save the model. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''.
seed: Seed for random number generator. TYPE: non-negative integer or -1 (random). DEFAULT: -1.
step_and_time: Variable for storing the time of runs and continuations of runs as comma seperated list of . TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''.
origin: Variable for storing arguments which differed wrt. defaults and their tier/values. TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''.

no_diffusion: TODO, not implemented. Should a normal non-diff UNet be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
noise_schedule: Which noise schedule? TYPE: One of: ['linear','cosine','linear_simple']. DEFAULT: cosine.
sigma_small: Should the small sigma posterior std deviation value be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false. DEFAULT: false.
schedule_sampler: Which strategy for timestep sampling to use for the schedule? TYPE: One of: ['uniform','low_discrepency','uniform_low_d']. DEFAULT: uniform.
input_scale: Input scaling factor, where 1.0 is no scaling and lower values towards 0 induce noisier schedules. TYPE: float.
logsnr_min: Minimum value for logsnr. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: -10.0.
logsnr_max: Maximum value for logsnr. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 10.0.

use_checkpoint: Should gradient checkpointing be used (reduced memory usage, more flops)? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
channel_multiplier: Channel multipliers for the UNet, specifying the number of layers and their multiplier with num_channels. TYPE: comma separated list of ints. DEFAULT: 'auto'.
dropout: UNet dropout probability. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.0.
predict: How to parmeterize x_t. TYPE: One of ['x','v','eps','both']. DEFAULT: 'x'.
use_scale_shift_norm: Should scaling and shifting of normalization layers be be used for class conditioning? otherwise simply linear addition. TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
num_res_blocks: Number of residual blocks per scale. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 3.
num_heads: Number of attention heads for downsampling and middle blocks. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 4.
num_heads_upsample: Number of attention heads for upsampling. TYPE: positive integer or -1 (same as num_heads). DEFAULT: -1.
num_channels: Base channel number. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 64.
attention_resolutions: Resolutions to perform attention on. TYPE: comma separated list of integers representing idx with -1 being the deepest resolution. DEFAULT: '-2,-1'.
image_size: Image resolution. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 128.
deeper_net: Should a deeper net be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
weak_signals: Should weak signals (bbox,points) be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
class_type: Which class type to use? TYPE: One of ['none','datasets' (TODO),'num_classes']. DEFAULT: 'none'.
self_cond: Should self conditioning during diffusion be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
max_num_classes: Maximum number of class labels. TYPE: positive integer or 0 (no maximum). DEFAULT: 0.
cond_type: TODO, not implemented. Which conditioning type to use? TYPE: One of ['none','class','domain','both']. DEFAULT: 'none'.
time_cond_type: TODO, not implemented. Which time conditioning type to use? TYPE: One of ['t','logsnr']. DEFAULT: 't'.
onehot: Should onehot encoding be used for class labels? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
final_activation: Activation function to apply once as the final layer inn the network. One of ['tanh','softmax','none']. TYPE: string. DEFAULT: 'none'.
image_encoder: Image encoder to use. TYPE: One of ['none','sam_vit_h','sam_vit_l','sam_vit_b']. DEFAULT: 'none'.
image_encoder_depth: Depth of the layer to add the image encoder features for the UNet. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 0

gen_interval: Evaluate every n steps. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 1000.
gen_setups: Which sampler setups to use for evaluation? TYPE: comma separated list of strings. DEFAULT: 'vali,train'.
remove_old_plots: Should old plots be removed? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
save_ckpt_steps: Save checkpoint when reaching step number in training. TYPE: comma separated list of integers or -1 (no saving). DEFAULT: '-1,'.
resume_from_step: Resume training as if it was started at the checkpoint step. TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
save_interval: Save checkpoint every n steps. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 5000.
log_vali_interval: Log validation and mean train metrics every n steps. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 200.
log_train_metrics: Which metrics to log during all steps? TYPE: comma separated list of strings. DEFAULT: 'loss,'.
update_loss_plot_interval: Update loss plot every n steps. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 200.
update_forward_pass_plot_interval: Update forward pass plot every n steps. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 200.
num_vali_batches: Number of batches to use for validation each vali_interval. TYPE: positive integer or 0 (no validation). DEFAULT: 8.
run_without_test: Should all evaluation be skipped? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
mode: Which mode to run in? new: new training, cont: continue from ckpt, load: load ckpt and make new TYPE: One of ['new','cont','load']. DEFAULT: 'new'.
ckpt_name: Path to load ckpt from. Empty string for ckpt_name='./saves/ver-*/*[model_name]*/ckpt_*.pt'. TYPE: DEFAULT: '' .
save_best_ckpt: Should the best checkpoint be tracked and saved? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
best_ckpt_metric: Which metric to use for best checkpoint tracking. TYPE: string. DEFAULT: 'max_ari'.
best_ckpt_gen_setup_idx: Which gen setup idx to use for best checkpoint tracking. TYPE: integer. DEFAULT: 0.
best_ckpt_full: Should the full model (ema+training+opt) be saved for the best checkpoint? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
debug_run: Should a debug run be performed? TYPE: str. DEFAULT: ''

cat_ball_data: Should categorical ball data be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
loss_weights: Which loss weights function to use? TYPE: One of ['uniform','SNR','SNR_plus1','SNR_trunc']. DEFAULT: 'SNR'.
loss_type: Which loss type to use? TYPE: One of ['mse','ce1','ce2']. DEFAULT: 'mse'.
betas: Adam betas. TYPE: comma separated list of floats. DEFAULT: '0.9,0.999'.
bce_loss: Should BCE loss be used? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
min_label_size: Minimum relative label mask size in relation to the image. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.01.
image_prob: Probability of image being given as input. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.9.
weak_bbox_prob: Probability of weak bbox being given as input. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.25.
weak_points_prob: Probability of weak points being given as input. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.25.
self_cond_prob: Probability of self conditioning being used. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.25.
classes_prob: Probability of classes being given as input. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.95.
self_cond_batched: Should self conditioning be identical on a per-batch-basis? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: false.
cond_prob: Probability of conditioning being used. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.25.
max_iter: Maximum number of training iterations. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 100000.
datasets: Which datasets to use? TYPE: comma separated list of strings. DEFAULT: 'non-medical,'.
split_ratio: Ratio of train, vali, test split. TYPE: comma separated list of 3 floats. DEFAULT: '0.8,0.1,0.1'.
train_batch_size: Batch size for training. positive integer. DEFAULT: 8.
vali_batch_size: Batch size for validation. positive integer. DEFAULT: 8.
lr_warmup_steps: Number of warmup steps for learning rate. TYPE: positive integer or 0 (no warmup). DEFAULT: 0.
lr_warmup_type: Which warmup type to use? TYPE: One of ['cosine','linear']. DEFAULT: 'linear'.
lr_decay_steps: Which decaying type to use? TYPE: One of ['cosine','linear']. DEFAULT: 'linear'.
lr_decay_type: Which decaying type to use? TYPE: One of ['cosine','linear']. DEFAULT: 'cosine'.
use_fp16: Should fp16 be used for memory reduction? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
fp16_scale_growth: Growth constant for fp16 loss scale when NANs are not encountered. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.001.
ema_rate: EMA rate for model weights. TYPE: comma separated list of floats. DEFAULT: '0.9999,'.
clip_grad_norm: Gradient clipping norm. Disabled when 0.0. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 1.0.
shuffle_zero: Should the zeroth channel (background) be shuffled? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
geo_aug_prob: Probability of geometric augmentation being used. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.0.
crop_method: Which crop method to use? TYPE: One of ['multicrop_most_border','multicrop_most_classes','full_image','sam_small','sam_big']. DEFAULT: 'multicrop_most_border'.
dl_num_workers: Number of workers for dataloader. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 4
ignore_padded: Should the border be ignored when training on images with border padding? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
split_method: Which split method to use? TYPE: One of ['random','native_train','native']. DEFAULT: 'random'.

logs_folder: Folder for logs. TYPE: string. DEFAULT: '../logs2/'.
no_label_prob: Probability of no class label being given as input. TYPE: float. DEFAULT: 0.1.
num_classes: Number of classes. TYPE: positive integer or 0 (no classes). DEFAULT: 0.
clip_denoised: Should the denoised image be clipped to the input range? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true. DEFAULT: true.
num_votes: Number of votes for evaluation. TYPE: positive integer. DEFAULT: 5.
num_save_samples: Number of samples to save when evaluating. TYPE: positive integer or 0 (no saving). DEFAULT 8.
num_save_samples_fixed: TODO, not implemented. Number of fixed samples to save when evaluating. TYPE: positive integer or 0 (no fixed saving). DEFAULT 8.
sample_function: Which sample functions to use? TYPE: comma separated list of strings. DEFAULT: 'cat,grid,single,inter'.
gen_num_steps: Number of timesteps used for evaluation during training. positive integer. DEFAULT: 100. DEFAULT: 100.
gen_guidance_weight: Weight of guidance loss during evaluation. TYPE: positive float or 0.0 (no guidance). DEFAULT: 0.0.
gen_train_samples: Should training samples be generated? TYPE: boolean. DEFAULT: true.
gen_batch_size: Batch size for evaluation. positive integer or 0 (same as train_batch_size). DEFAULT: 0.
gen_ema_step: Step after which to also use EMA models for evaluation. TYPE: integer. DEFAULT: 50000
